database.title: Nero Screenmate
database.description:
I've been wating to make this since 2017!!
Only now can I have the time or the knowledge to do so...

I wrote it in AutoIt. thought, I mostly used other people's work. I used:
GIFAnimation.au3 (c) trancexx to load in and display GIF file.
MouseOnEvent.au3 (c) G.Sandler a.k.a (Mr)CreatoR for mouse tracking.
I just decided which GIF to be displayed at which time and moved them around :b.

Because It's Written in AutoIt, some anti-virus might find it dangerous.
So I'll give you the whole source code :v.

Character is from Devil may cry series (c) Capcom

database.title: Rectangle
database.description:
This was written in Java.
This was made to test some mechanic in a game, which I'd been working on with my friends. But since that game was canceled, I figured I should put it up here.
A,S,D,W to move.
Right mouse to shoot bullets.
Left mouse to shoot web?
